name: Random Apple
description:
Jump and run platformer which was made in 2 days while the GMTK Game Jam. The theme was to make a "out of control" game and you will see what our interpretation of out of control was when you play it. ;) Nothing for the weak! ;) 

The main objective of our game is to get the highest possible score! You earn points thought collecting different Apples. Some Apples give you less points and some give you more. But the golden apple which will give you the most points are also the most dangerous ones.
